_sText:
Attention Haters: Go Ahead Keep hatin' on my map! Cause you know its the fastest!

This map allows you to attain God of War and Blood Money Achievements without lifting a finger!

~~~~ SUPER FAST ~~~~
I included a slightly slower version that uses mp_restartgame 1.
~~~~ SUPER FAST ~~~~

It took me about 2 minutes to get the first screenshot! 1624 rounds with 30 bot kills each round! 

Just run the map and it will get you kills all on its own!
You will also receive other achievements as well!

Regular version gets 60+ kills every second! (Maybe faster if you have a better pc). Get 10,000 kills in ~2 Minutes!

Double your slots to 60 and get them even faster!!!


Instructions:
1) Create a server
2) ---- JOIN THE TERRORIST TEAM ---- VERY IMPORTANT
3) Make mp_autobalance 0 and mp_limitteams 0
4) Add bots using bot_add_(team)
5) IF YOU WANT TO SWITCH TEAMS - USE THE BUTTON!!!!

THE BUTTON MUST BE USED TO SWITCH TEAMS!!!!

Remember the commands - Remember the button - and Enjoy!
<hr width=400>
